meanings.definition: A young man in ancient Greece undergoing military training.
meanings.sent1: The ephebe practiced with his sword every day.
meanings.sent2: The ephebe enjoyed learning about warfare and tactics.
meanings.sent3: The ephebe accidentally tripped over his own spear during training.
meanings.sent4: The ephebe's dedication to his military training was as strong as steel.
meanings.sent5: The image of the ephebe in his armor was etched in the minds of the villagers.

meanings.sent1: The ephebe played with his friends in the village square.
meanings.sent2: Every ephebe looks forward to becoming an adult one day.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous ephebe stole some apples from the market.
meanings.sent4: The ephebe's curiosity about the world was like a flame burning bright.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of the ephebe echoed through the streets as he ran with joy.
